verses.name: 2 Corinthians 7:5
verses.text: For, when we were come into Macedonia, our flesh had no rest, but we were troubled on every side; without were fightings, within were fears.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 7:6
verses.text: Nevertheless God, that comforteth those that are cast down, comforted us by the coming of Titus;

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 7:7
verses.text: And not by his coming only, but by the consolation wherewith he was comforted in you, when he told us your earnest desire, your mourning, your fervent mind toward me; so that I rejoiced the more.
